metadata.title: USN-4842-1 -- ntopng vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that ntopng did not properly seed its random number generator, leading to predictable session tokens. An attacker could use this vulnerability to hijack a user's session.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4842-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ntopng - 3.2+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2 ntopng-data - 3.2+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
